short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ignite your browsing experience with the intense power of Dabi from My Hero Academia!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension features live wallpapers of Dabi, showcasing his fierce Blueflame form. Let his fiery presence light up your screen every time you open a new tab.

Features:
🎨 Stunning live wallpaper of Dabi with his powerful Blueflame.
🌐 Customizable search bar for your preferred search engine.
🕒 Clock and date display for added functionality.
🔗 Quick-access shortcuts to easily navigate your favorite websites.
Feel the heat of Dabi’s destructive power and bring the world of My Hero Academia to your browser with this immersive live wallpaper extension.

More extensions: https://haberikra.com/
Contact us: https://haberikra.com/contact-us/
Privacy policy: https://haberikra.com/privacy-policy/
